20842.……どこからか ひそひそと\n話す声が 聞こえてくる。:
I can hear whispered voices coming from
somewhere.

20843.「すごいよ ノーラン兄ちゃん……！\n 取り引き場所を 突きとめるなんて！:
That's great, Brother Noran...! You've tracked
down the location of the deal!

20844.「ノーラン兄ちゃんが 来てくれれば\n 魔法戦士団は 今よりも\n もっと 強力:
If only Brother Noran would come, the
Armamentalist Corps would be a much more
powerful organization than it is now...

20845.「魔法戦士の話は もういい。\n オレが守りたいのは この国なんだ。:
I don't want to talk about armamentalists.
What I want to protect is this country.

20846.「オレは 巡視の任務に戻る。\n そっちも がんばるんだな ユナティ。:
I'm going back to patrol duty. Good luck with
that too, Yunaty.

20848.「<pc> 何をしている？\n 調達任務が 終わったのならば\n すぐに 魔法戦:
<pc> What are you doing? As soon as
your procurement mission is over, come to the
Armamentalist Corps salon.

20849.<center>アーベルクの号令によって\n魔法戦士たちが サロンに集められた。:
By Aberuku's order, the armamentalists were
gathered in the salon. At last, the time came
for them to go into battle.

20850.「我がヴェリナード王立魔法戦士団の\n 華麗なる 魔法戦士たちよ！:
The Great Armamentalist Corps of the Royal
Verinard!

20851.「ウェナ諸島の魔物が 幾多の国で暴れるという\n これまでにない 事態が起こった:
Never before have the monsters of the Wena
Islands run amok in so many lands!

20852.「だが 我ら魔法戦士団が\n 女王の御心を持ちて 救いの手を差しのべ\n その被:
But we, the Armamentalist Corps, with the
Queen's will in our hearts, came to the
rescue, and the damage was kept to a minimum!

20853.「そして今！ その主犯たる人物\n 魔物商人ザルギスの存在が 明らかとなった！:
And now! The main culprit, the monster trader
Zargis, has been revealed!

20854.「ザルギスは 強力な魔物を\n 大量に 売りさばこうとしている！\n この暴挙を:
Zargis is trying to sell a large number of
powerful monsters! This outrage must not be
tolerated!

20855.「女王ディオーレも 心を痛めておられる。\n 我らが女王のためにも 早く\n な:
Queen Diore is heartbroken. For the sake of
our queen, something must be done quickly or
we will be in trouble~!

20856.「我ら魔法戦士団は 制圧任務に出撃する！\n 取り引きを未然に防ぎ ザルギスを捕:
We, the Armamentalist Corps, are on a mission
of control! Prevent a deal from happening and
capture Zargis!

20857.「目標は オーグリード大陸！\n ギルザッド地方で確認された\n トガス岩道と呼:
Our target is Ogreed Continent! It is a cave
called the Togas Trail, identified in Gilzad
Region.

20858.「規律に生き 規律に殉ずる覚悟はあるか！\n 魔法戦士の諸君！ 剣をかかげよ！！:
Are you ready to live by discipline? Are you
ready to die for discipline?
Armamentalists! Raise your swords!

20860.<center>こうして 魔法戦士たちは 出撃していった。: And so the armamentalists set out.

20861.「来たか <cs_pchero>。\n ノーランの情報は 正しかった。\n 魔物:
You're here <cs_pchero>. Noran's information
was correct. They found the monster trader
Zargis.

20862.「キヒヒヒ……。そろったか 魔法戦士団。\n 待ってたんだぜえ。:
Kihihihihi... you are here, Armamentalist
Corps. We've been waiting for you.

20863.「……待っていたとは どういうことだ。\n 取り引きは どうしたのだ？:
What do you mean you were waiting for me?
What's the deal?

20864.「取り引き？ ほおー。ノーランのヤツは\n ずいぶん あんたらに 信頼されてんだ:
Deal? Wow. Noran must have a lot of faith in
you guys. It's a good thing we talked to him.

20865.「貴様……。ノーランに 何を吹き込んだ！: You... what did you tell Noran?

20866.「ん？ 前に会ったよな？ そんときに\n 魔法戦士団って むかつくよなーって\n:
Hmm? We met before, right? I told him that
Armamentalist Corps was disgusting, and he got
on my bandwagon.

20867.「それで魔法戦士団に ひと泡吹かせてやろうって\n 話になったわけよ。ウソの取り:
So, we decided to give the Armamentalist Corps a good beating. We lured the Armamentalist Corps with false information about the deal
and... kee-hee-hee!

20868.「……てなわけで 引っかかった あんたらぁ\n ここで ひとり残らず 死ぬってえ:
And that's why I'm stuck here, you guys are
going to die, every last one of you!

20869.「世界に名の知れた 魔法戦士団を倒したとなりゃ\n うちの商品は 売れまくり ま:
Now that we've defeated the world-famous Armamentalist Corps, our products are sure to sell like hotcakes! Hyah, hyah, hyah, hyah,
hyah!

20870.「くっ なんという数だ。\n <cs_pchero>は 大物を引きつけろ！\n:
Damn, what a number. <cs_pchero> Attract the
big fish! We will annihilate the small fry!

20871.「改良型のナンバー７を なめるなよ。\n それに 最新作ナンバー１２のパワーもな:
Don't underestimate the improved Number 7. And
don't forget the power of the newest number
12. You'll learn that one the hard way!

20872.「<cs_pchero>！ 戦いは続いているぞ。\n 貴公は 大物を引きつけてく:
<cs_pchero>! The fight is on. You, you
attract the big boys!

20873.「なんでぇ。あんた まだ 生きてたんかい。\n 獲物には しっかり トドメを刺せ:
Why? You're still alive? I trained you to put
the finishing touches on your prey.

20875.「くっ……。これで すべて倒したか……？: Damn... did we beat them all...?

20876.「うーん……。ナンバー１２は\n バランスが イマイチだったか。\n あんな若手:
Well... the balance of number 12 is not so
good. I hope they can beat such a young
armamentalist.

20877.「さて 倉庫の掃除をしなきゃな。 \n 汚ねーゴミが 転がってやがる。:
Well, I have to clean out the warehouse.
There's filthy garbage lying around.

20878.<center>魔法戦士たちは その後も\n死力を尽くして戦った。:
The armamentalists then continued to fight to
the death.

20879.<center>だが いくら倒しても 魔物は次々と現れた。\n多くの魔法戦士が倒:
But no matter how many monsters we defeated,
they kept coming back. Many armamentalists
fell, and finally the battle was over...

20880.「ぬぬうっ？ なんてこった。 \n まさか 品切れまで いっちまうなんてよ。:
Nuh-uh? What a surprise. I can't believe
they're out of stock.

20883.「<cs_pchero>。任務は失敗だ……。\n すみやかに 撤退したまえ。:
<cs_pchero>. The mission has failed...
withdraw promptly.

20886.「城の者に聞いたが ノーランは\n 魔法戦士団が 帰ってくるのを見て\n 青い顔:
The men at the castle told me that when Noran
saw the Armamentalist Corps returning, he ran
outside with a blue face...

20887.「やはりな。魔物商人ザルギスと結託し\n 我ら魔法戦士団を おとしいれたこと。\:
As I thought. He colluded with the monster trader Zargis and bewitched us, the Armamentalist Corps. There is no longer any
doubt.

20888.「ノーランは 国家反逆人として 指名手配する。\n かばいだてするなら そちらも:
Noran is wanted for treason. If you cover for
him, you're just as guilty.

20889.「衛士団を みくびるな！\n ノーランを捕らえるのなら 協力はする。\n 本人か:
Don't underestimate the Guard! If you want to get Noran, I'll help you. But I'm not convinced until I hear the truth from the man
himself!

20890.「<pc>。今回の任務は 失敗だ……。\n ゆえに 貴公への報酬も 用意されない:
<pc>. This mission has failed...
hence, there will be no reward for you.

20891.「だが……。貴公のチカラは\n これから さらに必要となるだろう……。:
But I'm afraid we're going to need more of
your help.

20892.「私から 貴公に 技を託す……。\n 我が魔法戦士団に伝わる 必殺の技だ。:
I entrust you with this technique... It's a
special technique passed down to our
Armamentalists.

20893.「……この技があれば いざというときに\n ＭＰを回復できるうえ 敵に与えるダメ:
...With this technique, you can recover MP when the need arises, and you can also expect to increase the damage you inflict on your
enemies.

20894.「私が 個人的に 報酬を用意した。\n 受け取ってくれ……。:
I have personally arranged a reward for you.
Please accept...

20895.「ノーランが なぜ こんなことをしたか\n わからないが……。:
I don't know why Noran did this, but I do
know...

20896.「我々 魔法戦士団は……ザルギスだけではなく\n 指名手配されたノーランも 追う:
We, the Armamentalist Corps, are not only
after Zargis, but also the wanted man, Noran.

20897.「ふたりの足取りを追うには 時間が必要だ……。\n 時を待ち 魔法戦士となって:
I need time to retrace their steps... wait for the right moment and come here as armamentalists. I will not allow you to make
the same mistake I made this time.

28345.「しゃあねえ。この辺で 店じまいだ。\n だいぶ 魔法戦士団を痛めつけてやったし:
Oh well. I'll close up store around here.
We've hurt the Armamentalist Corps enough that
it'll be easier to do business for a while.

28347.「……おのれ ノーラン。\n どういうつもりなのだ……。:
Oh, my God, Noran. What the hell do you think
you're doing...
